section.heading: External audit of the receiver’s books.
section.text: The Superior Court of the District of Columbia may, as it deems desirable, order audits to be made of the books of the Commissioner relating to any receivership established under this chapter, and a report of each audit shall be filed with the Commissioner and with the court. The books, records, and other documents of the receivership shall be made available to the auditor at any time without notice. The expense of each audit shall be considered a cost of administration of the receivership.
